Articles.Content: Hey guys! Its been a long time since I posted something here. I have a suggestion. Since some people have Windows 8 and 8.1, KSP should add a touchscreen mode so they wont need keyboard and mouse to play. If this suggestion is bunk, close it! I dont care if you close it! Happy playing!

Windows 8 is not required to use a touchscreen.

As an option though, I can't see a touchscreen-friendly UI being too bad. I've already played KSP via a streaming app on a tablet. Add a few on-screen button widgets (which the streaming app allowed me to do), and flying vehicles is very possible. It's probably better to work on other parts of the game first though. KSP via touchscreen is interesting, but it doesn't add all that much to the game.

Just don't make it require Windows 8 to use. Some of us are avoiding that awful thing like the plague until MSFT come to their collective senses.
